Summary Jean Anderson is a highly influential, results-driven, business continuity/disaster recovery (BC/DR) leader with a passion for empowering companies and communities to maintain continuous operations and respond quickly and successfully during catastrophic disasters. 
 
Leveraging a dynamic combination of leadership in disaster prevention, response and mitigation and deep technical expertise, Anderson is a Certified Business Continuity Professional with years of proven success using the latest best-in-class technologies, architecture, best practices and process solutions to protect corporate data and revenue for companies worldwide. 
 
As a respected thought leader and subject matter expert, she is known as an enthusiastic advocate for BC/DR among both internal and external communities, as well as a strong collaborator across diverse stakeholders - including community, government and non-profit entities. 
 
A quality-driven manager with a reputation for organization and efficiency in high-pressure, deadline-driven, rapidly changing environments, she excels at creating and managing program plans and leading high-performing teams to achieve exceptional results.
